body_html: Sorry for late response. The issue has got resolved after re-intalling CUDA driver and cuDNN packages. Seems CUDA and cuDNN had been corrupted. This led to connection breach between tensorflow and GPU and hence, tensorflow was not able to find GPU.

body: Sorry for late response. The issue has got resolved after re-intalling CUDA driver and cuDNN packages. Seems CUDA and cuDNN had been corrupted. This led to connection breach between tensorflow and GPU and hence, tensorflow was not able to find GPU.
